title: 15 Really Weird Questions That Can Be Your Dose Of Laughter Today
text:
15 Really Weird Questions That Can Be Your Dose Of Laughter Today

15 Really Weird Questions That Can Be Your Dose Of Laughter Today

When I was a student in school, my teacher used to encourage everybody - including me - to ask more and more questions. It is the curious child that makes it big in life, they used to say.

Now, it's even easier to ask questions and seek answers, all thanks to the Internet. It is full of weird people posting all the more weird stuff, some of which are mighty hilarious! From memes to tweets, there is an endless space out there that we all live for.

Here are some of the weirdest questions on Twitter and you might just get a stitch in your stomach fro laughing too hard.

1. Here is a difficult one...

If you lose your virginity and then you get in an accident that causes amnesia, does that mean you're a virgin again?#funnyquestions — SenseiSam (@SenseiSamSays) May 19, 2019

2. Sweep in?

If you're creepin deep on social media is there a better way to say "creepin"?#AskingForAFreind lol — DSun (@DaveedSun) June 25, 2017

Don't Miss 3.2 K SHARES 508 SHARES 390 SHARES 112 SHARES

3. Every time! Could I be any more disappointed?

Have you ever created an amazing Excel spreadsheet, but then been disappointed because none of your family or friends care ? #AskingForAFriend — Cass (@cassmoosa) October 13, 2019

4. I am too naive to answer that!

How do you make money off of dick pics? #askingforafriend — Donovan (@Donmjm) October 12, 2019

5. Kids ask all kinds of questions!

6. Yeah man, why?

Here is a mind boggling question:

Why do men have nipples. It’s not like we produce milk or anything. They are just there. Why?#WeirdQuestions — The End (@Deplexer2) October 12, 2019

7. Let me ask my rich friends. Or is that too personal?

Do rich people have softer buttholes because they can buy better toilet paper?#AskingForAFriend — Mark Bland (The HMFIC) (@markbland) October 9, 2019

8. Think people, think!

Dear vegetarians if your trying to save animals why are you eating their food? #funnyquestions — Gregory Jerome Wheel (@Gwheel13) February 2, 2015

9. Try karke dekh lo!

Can you start your period while your getting dick? #AskingForAFriend — Queen Juice (@Thicknfluffy) October 10, 2019

10. Is that a question?

Isn't it weird to think that people are 50% legs — William Pre-ah-cuss (@William_Priakos) September 23, 2015

11. There has never been a weirder description of blood.

it's weird to think that if you poke a human hard enough, particularly with something sharp, liquid comes out. — El (@ehllaks) April 20, 2016

12. The world is a strange place!

Sex is so weird like hey I love you let me stick my hard extra limb into ur tiny hole and then slam it into u repeatedly because I love you — yes (@omgtootruetbh) April 18, 2016

13. May be!
description: When I was student in school my teacher used to encourage everybody including me to ask more and more questions. It is the curious child that make it big in life they used to say. However, I feel now asking questions has became a trend but not now that internet has given us a platform, People ask anything and everything. Internet is full of weird people posting all the more weird stuff which
